meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sam Spaulding Hans von Walter Erin McLean Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6025.

td.p: Sam Spaulding, a sophomore from Yale University from Wilmington, North Carolina (subtotal of $4,400)
Hans von Walter, a junior from Southern Adventist University from Avon Park, Florida (subtotal of $0)
Erin McLean, a sophomore from Boston University from Danvers, Massachusetts (subtotal of $15,999)

tr.td: A NATION DIVIDED
GAME & REALITY SHOWS
MY DORM ROOM IS SO SMALL...
BIBLE GUYS
ACADEMIC DEGREES
"INTER" MURALS
